body_html: If you create the tf.assign() ops outside the branch functions, this is working as intended. I answered the question on Stack Overflow with an explanation of how to make this consistent.
body_text: If you create the tf.assign() ops outside the branch functions, this is working as intended. I answered the question on Stack Overflow with an explanation of how to make this consistent.
body: If you create the `tf.assign()` ops outside the branch functions, this is working as intended. I [answered the question on Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/a/44936931/3574081) with an explanation of how to make this consistent.
